lead_paragraph: BALES--Suzy. Hunter College mourns the loss of alumna Suzy Bales '77, board member of the Hunter College Foundation and a wonderful friend. An avid reader with an MA in Literature, Suzy was a dedicated supporter of Hunter's Creative Writing Program. A gifted gardener, she designed Roosevelt House's terrace garden. The Loewe Theatre plaza garden, named for her, celebrates her life. We will miss her and extend our condolences to her loving family. Contributions in Suzy's memory can be made to The Hunter College Foundation Mother's Day Scholarship Fund. 1/3
